QuestData.Title: The Commander
QuestData.Description: Scarlet Commander Marjhan is cunning, shrewd, and willing to do anything to win a battle. Before all these things, however, she is loyal.$b$bI have no doubt you'll find her in the barracks' central chamber, fighting under a crimson banner, until she either wins or dies.$b$bMake sure it's the latter.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She has nothing left to lose.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you get a chance before you put her down, tell her I sent my regards.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, good. These barracks are as good as fallen.
